description: Delete a material transaction cost code allocation

flags.name: --confirm
flags.validation: Must be set to true to delete.

permissions: Admins may delete allocations. Non-admin users may delete allocations only when they are members of the allocation's customer.
side_effects: Deletes a material transaction cost code allocation if permitted and not blocked by dependent records.
validation_notes: Argument <id> is required. --confirm must be set to true. Deletion is blocked if dependent project phase cost item actuals exist.
